response.overview: THIS TRON-LIKE SCI-FI THRILLER BEGINS WITH THE KIDNAPPING OF BYRAN BY GATOR,A COMPUTER GENERATED PERSON. AS CYBER POLIC VICAR AND MORREY SEARCH THROUGH THE NETWORK TO RESCUE BYRAN AND BRING HIM AND BRING HIM BACK TO THE REAL WORLD,THEY DISCOVER THAT THE TRUE MASTERMIND IS A GROUP OF TECHNO NINJAS INTENDING ON USING BYRANS COMPUTER EXPERTISE TO CONTROL THE ENTIRE SYSTEM. CAN VICAR AND MORREY SAVE BYRAN THE ENTIRE NETWORK FROM OBLIVION.
response.title: Sagupaan: Huling Digmaan
